00024 #define FOREACH_SERIE(index, dataset) \
00025         for (int index = 0; index < dataset->GetSerieCount(); index++)
00026 
00027 #define FOREACH_DATAITEM(index, serie, dataset) \
00028         for (int index = 0; index < dataset->GetCount(serie); index++)

00034 class WXDLLIMPEXP_FREECHART DatasetObserver
00035 {
00036 public:
00037         DatasetObserver();

00040         virtual void DatasetChanged(Dataset *dataset) = 0;
00041 };

00047 class WXDLLIMPEXP_FREECHART Dataset : public wxObject,
00048         public RefObject, public Observable<DatasetObserver>, public DrawObserver
00049 {
00050         DECLARE_CLASS(Dataset)
00051 public:
00052         Dataset();
00053         virtual ~Dataset();
00054 
00059         void SetRenderer(Renderer *renderer);
00060 
00061         Renderer *GetBaseRenderer();
00062 
00063         void BeginUpdate();
00064 
00065         void EndUpdate();
00066 
00071         virtual int GetSerieCount() = 0;
00072 
00078         virtual int GetCount(int serie) = 0;
00079 
00085         virtual wxString GetSerieName(int serie) = 0;
00086 
00087         virtual double GetMinValue(bool vertical) = 0;
00088 
00089         virtual double GetMaxValue(bool vertical) = 0;
00090 
00091         virtual DateTimeDataset *AsDateTimeDataset();
00092 
00093         //
00094         // DrawObjectObserver
00095         //
00096         // Received from renderer
00097         virtual void NeedRedraw(DrawObject *obj);
00098 
00099 protected:
00104         virtual bool AcceptRenderer(Renderer *r) = 0;

00107

00109         bool m_updating;
00110         bool m_changed;
00111 
00112 private:
00113         FIRE_WITH_THIS(DatasetChanged);
